message.name: ERR_PAYMENTOPTIONS_XRV_FROM_DATE_BEFORE_PREV_SERVICEPAYMENTOPTIONS_FROM_DATE
message.locale: The Start Date, %1d, must be after the previous payment option Start Date, %2d.

message.name: ERR_PAYMENTOPTIONS_XFV_FROM_DATE_BEFORE_SERVICEOFFERING_FROM_DATE
message.locale: The Start Date, %1d, must be on or after the service offering Start Date, %2d.

message.name: ERR_PAYMENTOPTIONS_XRV_MUST_NOT_MODIFY_INITIAL_SERVICEPAYMENTOPTIONS_START_DATE
message.locale: The earliest service offering payment option Start Date, %1d, cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_PAYMENTOPTIONS_XRV_RATE_ALREADY_EXISTS_WITH_STARTDATE_ENDDATE
message.locale: The provider payment option already exists from %1d to %2d.

message.name: ERR_PAYMENTOPTIONS_XRV_RATE_ALREADY_EXISTS_WITH_STARTDATE
message.locale: The provider payment option already exists from %1d.

message.name: ERR_PAYMENTOPTIONS_XFV_FROM_DATE_BEFORE_PROVIDER_FROM_DATE
message.locale: The Start Date, %1d, must be on or after the provider Enrollment Date, %2d.
The Start Date, %1d, must be on or after the provider Enrolment Date, %2d.

message.name: ERR_PAYMENTOPTIONS_XFV_CANNOT_BE_DELETED
message.locale: This payment option has been used to make a payment, it cannot be deleted.
